price: 50 Ils dirent : « Qu’importe puisque nous ferons retour à notre Seigneur
arabic: قَالُواْ لَا ضَيۡرَۖ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا مُنقَلِبُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: qālū lā ḍayra innā ilā rabbinā munqalibūna
